alert.note: Alert for Cochran; Hockley; Terry; Yoakum (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 02 at 7:43PM CDT until May 02 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN COCHRAN...TERRY...SOUTHWESTERN HOCKLEY AND EASTERN YOAKUM COUNTIES... At 743 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles south of Bledsoe to 11 miles southwest of Sundown to 9 miles southeast of Tokio, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Brownfield, Plains, Sundown, Lehman, Tokio, and Wellman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
